version_description:
Edit Tracks & Routes with Topo Maps+ PRO
- Edit the start and end of a track or route.
- Edit a section in the middle of a track or route.
- Save your edits as a new track/route or update the existing track/route.

Other
- Map scroll & zoom performance improvements when you have lots of routes & tracks on the map.
- You can now create a route from a track. If you have PRO, this will let you use the route for trail segments or to join it with other routes.
- Finished migrating the sync service to a new backend. (All of your data is migrated and saved., you will just need to re-login on the next sync to authentic with the new sync server.)
- When routes or waypoints are missing images, they are now recreated.
- Added support to import waypoint notes from gpx files.
- Added icon support for importing waypoints from Halfmile gpx files.

Bug Fixes
- Fixed an issue where the sync service was reporting it was unavailable when it was actually available.
- Fixed a bug where printing a map would sometimes zoom out too far.
- Fixed a few crashes.
- Fixed the keyboard covering the route name on the iPad.
- Fixed an issue that can cause GPS points to get recorded in the wrong order when recording tracks.
- Fixed the MapBox Terrain map not downloading all zoom levels.
- Fixed export/import to KML files not correctly restoring waypoint icons.

What's New in 4.3.1
- Fixed bug where syncing purchase between devices was not activating and saving the purchase.

What's New in 4.3

Edit Tracks & Routes with Topo Maps+ PRO
- Edit the start and end of a track or route.

- Fixed a few crashes.
- Fixed the keyboard covering the route name on the iPad.
- Fixed an issue that can cause GPS points to get recorded in the wrong order when recording tracks.
- Fixed the MapBox Terrain map not downloading all zoom levels.
- Fixed export/import to KML files not correctly restoring waypoint icons.

AUTOMATIC SYNC
Sync is now occurs automatically in the background. This means you no longer need to press the sync button every time you want to sync your data :) Since you wouldn't want to waste battery trying to make cellular internet connections when you are hiking to sync data, the default for automatic sync is to only sync over WIFI. You can turn automatic sync on/off and sync over WIFI only on/off in the settings in the app.


IMPROVED MAP DELETION
Deleting downloaded maps is now easier. You can select multiple regions and then choose to delete all of them at once. Under My Data there is a new section for My Downloaded Maps. It shows you the total size for your maps and lets you delete all maps or delete all of one type of map.

IMPROVEMENTS
- More trail names are printed on printed maps.
- Waypoint titles are smaller on printed maps.
- Added reverse direction to the settings for traced routes.
- Changed region selection. You now have to tap on the title or the edge. This makes it easier to work with the map when you zoom in on an area that has a region.
- Longer routes show when zoomed out.
- When you edit a route you can extend the start or end.
- You can now share or export a single waypoint.


BUG FIXES
- Fixed an issue that could cause GPS to turn off while recording a hike.
- Fixed magnetic declination on printed maps not working.
- Fixed map download status and progress not working on non-retina devices.
- Fixed going to a downloaded map from the list not working sometimes.
- Fixed edited routes & tracks not syncing.
- Fixed an issue where data could disappear after sync.
- Fixed KMZ files not importing.
- Fixed a number of crashes.
- Fixed a case where changing a trail to a dashed line wasn't working.
- Fixed sharing trails causing the coordinates get out of order in a few cases.
- Fixed rendering UTM zones on grid boundaries in the grid overlay.
- Fixed an issue that caused the elevation loss for a recorded track to show up differently on the elevation profile and the statistic page.
- The metric setting now transfers from the phone to the watch.

• You can now add a note to category.

Now with National Geographic Trails Illustrated Topographic Maps!

Trails Illustrated maps are the most popular and trusted outdoor recreation maps. With more than 200 maps, the Trails Illustrated map are available for most of America’s favorite outdoor destinations. Each map is created with help from local land managers and is rigorously reviewed. Each Trails Illustrated map has topographic information, trails, and recreational points of interest.

Each Trails Illustrated map can be purchased ala-carte for use without a subscription.

We've launched a completely new section in the app full of helpful tips and tricks! It’s organized in a way that if you’re new or a long-time user to Topo Maps+ you can find what you need quickly!

And another thing…if you don’t find it there, we've made it even easier to ask us your questions. In fact, we’ve included a button to contact us at the very top of About/Help!

US Forest Service Trails data overlay is now available for Pro users as selectable trails! Here are some of the awesome reasons we added this in:

* Better trail coverage in US Forest Service land than Open Street Maps
* Reliability of the the Forest Service
* Many of the trails include trail properties such as allowed use (Hike, Bike, Motorcycle, ATV, 4WB>50)
* Custom colors based on allowed use
* Typical trail grade

We’ve made some BIG additions to both Topo Maps+ Pro with this update as well as some new settings for everyone!

- Elevation heat map - this new WORLDWIDE overlay is just plain COOL! Customize your map color based on elevation
- Line of Sight - ever wonder what landmark you might be looking at out in the distance? Here’s a quick new tool connected to your
onboard compass to give you a line of sight visual with distance indicator!
- Offline elevations - You can now download an OFFLINE ELEVATION PROFILE for your maps. This means you can draw routes offline and
still get an elevation profile while you’re out in the backcountry!
- Ungroup photos - see the location of every photo without obscuring your map view!

New Settings for everyone:
- Disable Auto Lock directly from Topo Maps+ so your phone doesn’t go to sleep while using the app!
- Clear search history - tired of seeing your mis-spelled, past searches…now you can remove them!
- Auto add to open folder - just like the Mac App you can have all your planning saved into a folder for instant organization

We’ve overhauled the menus for the iPad app and all the menus got a bit of a face lift to better optimize the screen size.
